name: Chocolate Cake (Vegan)
description: A delicious and super easy vegan chocolate cake. Moist and crumbly made without any butter or eggs. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons high fat oil ((I used 2 Tbsp organic canola oil and 2 Tbsp Coconut oil))
5-6 tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent jaggery or other sweetener.
3 tablespoons cocoa powder ((I have organic fair trade unsweetened non alkaline, reduce cocoa powder if you like less dark cake))
6-8 Tablespoons warm water or non dairy milk
vegan chocolate chips ((optional, I dint use any, you can add some to the batter for melted chips in the cake!))

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add chopped apple, flax meal, vinegar, sugar, vanilla extract, oil and 6 Tablespoons warm water.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add chopped apple, flax meal, vinegar, sugar, vanilla extract, oil and 6 Tablespoons warm water.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend into a smooth puree and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend into a smooth puree and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the flours, cinnamon, salt, baking powder and cocoa powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the flours, cinnamon, salt, baking powder and cocoa powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the apple puree and mix till just about combined. If the mixture doesnt become moist and pasty , add more water. The water content need depends on the water content of the apple. The batter does not need to be smooth and runny.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the apple puree and mix till just about combined. If the mixture doesnt become moist and pasty , add more water. The water content need depends on the water content of the apple. The batter does not need to be smooth and runny.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a mini loaf and pour the batter in it.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a mini loaf and pour the batter in it.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with some oats and bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until the toothpick inserted in the Middle comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with some oats and bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until the toothpick inserted in the Middle comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Or top it off with some chocolate cream.. Blend some avocado, a couple of teaspoons of cocoa powder and maple syrup to get a cream. Adjust sweetness and layer it on the cake!
recipeInstructions.name: Or top it off with some chocolate cream.. Blend some avocado, a couple of teaspoons of cocoa powder and maple syrup to get a cream. Adjust sweetness and layer it on the cake!

keywords: easy cake recipe, quick vegan cake, vegan cake recipe
